import classnames from 'classnames'; import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; const WorksFrame = ({navState, item}) => { const {idx, idxName, title, date, content, link, desc} = item; return ( <>
{title} ({date})
Link {link}
Summary {content}
Description {desc}
); }; export default WorksFrame;
